content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of september 15th, 2009 i searched youtube for ufo video's to pass the time. i came across youtube address seeingufospa and was taken back that this woman lives 40 minutes from my home. she has an open invitation for people to come and help observe these events with her.
  i knew from the beginning she had nothing to hind and i set a date to meet with her. on the evening of september 24th, 2009 we, my girlfriend (sandy) and i arrived in her general area at 7:30 p.M. i followed directions of the location to be by a google earth map location she had shown on her youtube site.
  this area is very rural, hilly, heavily wooded, dark and very quite. without knowing where to start or where to look i decided to start at a golf course i found in her general area. sandy and i walked around the golf course for a while and found nothing of interest. i decided to leave the golf course and drive around the area for awhile. 
  while driving, i called alison about 7:55 and informed her we were in the area and asked her where we should meet. at that same time i passed a car along the road and alison asked if that was me that just passed her. i replied i think so. alison said pull over, there is one directly above you. i pulled over and we jumped out of the car and found alison with her camera in her hand recording a bright, slow moving object 300 feet above us. it is now 8:01 p.M.
  i grabed my camcorder to record this event also, i was so excited i forgot to remove the lens cap and missed most of that event. my first impression was this craft is completely silent and moved in a very slow smooth line. i recall it being an amber/golden glow that pulsed. it continued in what appeared to be a straight line and moved at a slow consistent speed. this sighting lasted 40 seconds or so.
  alison, sandy and myself headed back to the golf course for awhile and found and recorded a golden orb as seen in the attached video. while recording this object it moved slowly and suddenly streaked across the sky to reappeared a mile away. we then headed to a farm field alison knew. we stood and talked for 30 minutes or so and began to see lights that appeared in the trees. they were below the tree tops staying half way between there and the ground. i recorded eight(8) separate objects that evening. while alison recorded other objects from a different location at the farm, i believe there were 12 separate sightings that evening. at the farm lands i found a very bright light in the trees, as i set up to record the light it decreased in size and intensity. this object was located on the next ridge about 1000 feet away. these recordings i took are remarkable. the image shows a round globe, white to golden in surface color with red texture/lines under the surface, with an "eye" or round design/object within the lines. this interior structure seems to be looking around. after recording it for 30 seconds or so the interior detail disappeared and there is only a whiteish/golden glow. after recording this glowing object for 15 minutes or so, noticed as i zoom out from the object it appears to pulse. as i zoom back in, the detail once again is present for a time and then disappears. this process went on several times.
  after record that object in the trees i began to notice lights in several different locations. i asked alison if there were any homes located near the lights, she said no. several of these lights seem to turn on at different times and would disappear and suddenly a light would appear in the sky above. several recording made by alison were recorded by me from a different angle/location. my camcorder is an older unit so my tapes are not as good as the high definition ones but they are real.
  some of these objects/craft seem to make a plane like noise although the noise seems to be somewhat off or "late". something about them seems unreal. most though are completely silent. i am complete impressed and totally convinced these objects/craft are nothing i have ever seen. alison kruse is completely up front and forth right. her recordings, in my professional opinion, are some of the best evidence i have ever seen. i will personally testify that her recordings and her sightings to be 100% creditable and 100% real.
  there are many more hours of recordings by alison and myself that have not yet been seen. i have returned to record more on september 30th and october 1st 2009. i also have plans to return the evenings of october 18th, 19th and 20th to help alison. i also plan to personally trek into the woods as deeply as possible and record what ever it is we find.
  i can not get the video address to go into the address bar so follow this link.
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=pkmgnnrad4c
content.summary: Pennsylvania state constable see several objects with murrysville pennsylvania woman

content.detailedDescription: I slept soundly on the night of15oct night at about9 30 pm.I woke up to go to toilet for a pee,at that time i noticed through the window a pulsuating big bright crimson colour light moving lowly and slowly in straight direction from south east innerwest towards northwest going towards richmond.This kind of light i have never seen before in the sky,it was much bigger than the polar star say twice big and while pusuating it was three four times bigger,as i was inside the house with closed windows i could not hear any sound.I kept looking at it though i was feeling pressure to go to loo,i couldnt hold on and went when i came back it was still going slowly,at that time i checked the time it was 1 35 am approx it has taken full five minutes and i could still see it faintly at a distance and it looked faint orange colour.As my wife was sleeping soundly i didnot wake her up.In my life i have not seen this type of flying light,i am not sure what it was but it was not common and night time there are no low fying aircrafts.After this i kept sitting and looking out but nothing happened for about two hours and then i fell sleep.Itried to report straight away on phone but somehow it got delayed and now i feel i must report it as its not normal what happened that light i can still remember how beautiful crimson colour it had and the way it was pulsuating,for me it was strange experience and i want to share it and if possible have it invetigated thanks
content.summary: Low slow moving crimson colour pulsuating light three times bigger than star

content.detailedDescription:
My mother was visiting my aunt in tucson and they went for a ride out in the open range country, takeing pictures and just riding around.
after she returned home she didnot get the pictures developed right-away. itwas about a year later she developed them and at least 6 months after that before i seen them, as soon as i seen what was in the pictures i took them and put them in a lock box with the negitives and she kept the remaining pictures. the pictures i took were of a close-up view of a landed craft, it was golden colored and shaped like a sourcer compleat with landing gear. and the golden color was like a high energy field that showed up the film only. about a week after i had the pictures, i noticed the lockbox was opened with the lock still locked, and the only thing missing was the pictures and the negetives. i went to my mothers and checked the remaining pictures and found them stuck together. i managed to find one picture with a ship in the distance, but it still shows up golden and you can make out the shape also in this picture there is somthing odd in the forground, it looks like golden dots in a distorted area with horses or caddle. the distorted area looks round like a flatend bubble on the ground.
  i only have the one picture and no negetives.
content.summary: On ground not seen directly/showed up in picture.

content.detailedDescription:
Too many ufos almost every night to list detail, so only the last three best ones:

october 10, 2009:  after filming many ufos coming out of usual patch of woods in front of house from farm field across the road, caught one shooting a beam of some sort--no sound detected, but my car was next to my tripod running because it was cold.  made vapors or excited molecule action that was visible across tree like it was hot, but inspection of area next day showed no burn marks on ground nor unusual marks on tree. frame by frame of video shows the beam bending as it is seen through the glass of my car's windshield indicating it was not a lens flare.  video of it shot in gen3 nightvision here:  http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=gktwmzljxy0
video of ground where shot the next day here:
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=rgf8t_ju8su

october 11, 2009:  another ufo rose from woods and started to fly across valley (500-600 feet across), then suddenly lit up really bright like a big golden orb, sun-like in appearance,  traveled like that for a bit, then toned down and started flashing like a plane.  filmed in gen3 nightvision,  you can see the shape changing & morphing as it flew.  silent flying.  video to be posted later (when i get a chance).

october 13, 2009:  after another night of seeing multiple orbs descend into the woods then crafts rise from woods on surveillance cam, i decided to try and go closer to see if i could film them hiding in the woods before take off.  went to other side to general forbes trail to dead end by blackthorn golf course edge.  filmed several of them in the sky, then noticed a white blinking light that seemed close to edge of woods.  filmed that then to the right another one back by the cable tv line that runs through woods.  having already explored that in the day, i know it's heavy brush & fallen/cleared trees laying about that's difficult to navigate through without hedge clippers.  the multiple objects seemed sphere like with many lights that constantly changed and seemed to hover slightly.  did not seem to be actually touching the ground.  no sound. smaller ones where seen around the bigger ones.  pitch black, the sound of breaking branches scared me so i moved back to by my car to film & saw another smaller one move around the cable lines then disappear.  the full video can be seen here (3 parts)
part 1:  http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=lmd60kewws8
part 2:  http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=yiycaf0efv4
part 3:  http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=ujbcifxbe1g

part 3 of the video shows after wards when i went to shopping center where i filmed a smaller triangle ufo flying backwards on sept 25th (which, btw, doesn't even show on nexrad radar--only light clouds & light hits).  this time saw another large bright golden orb coming from different woods on ridge south of rt. 22.  while filming it, a small sphere whizzed past and danced around the light pole in the parking lot before it went out of sight.  the golden orb then turned on faa style lights and continued in the direction of monroeville--no sound was heard from it this time.

this same almost nightly phenomenon (except for rainy nights for some reason) is also occurring in new jersey where they are filmed by youtube.Com/user/mikie8865 and even as far away as moscow, russia by youtube.Com/user/olegen77 -- indicating this is not the only place this is happening and is not any type of our secret military crap.  if you read the comments left by others from different states and countries on my videos, you can see where else it's happening for yourself.
content.summary: Murrysville: multiple morphing ufos filmed hiding in woods & shooting beam

content.detailedDescription: At around 0630 after fueling up at a local gas station, on my way to work (park ranger), i looked due east from tipton california to the sierra mountains. i had earlier saw a flash of light from the corner of my eye. when i looked up i saw what appeared to be a comet. bright star like head with a gaseous tail. i thought "wow cool" got in my car and started to get in the car and pull out. then the "tail" changed direction 180 degrees and was now pointed down, it also appeared to change course/direction. while i knew it was traveling away from me, it appeared to be descending. as i continued to watch, the tail changed direction again to be behind the object (or to the rear of the direction traveling). i thought it may be a case of the sun trapping light in the clouds or water vapor as it had rained the day before, but this was 4 or 5 min. before dawn, and false dawn had not started yet, no clouds were visible before or after dawn. the object disappeared behind the sierra nevada's approx somewhere near the china lake nws region, it appeared to be descending. //nothing follows//
content.summary: Comet like object descends and changes course

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside with my girlfriend for a cigarette. we were talking about stars and i pointed one out that was bright enough to shine through a cloud to the southwest. she said, "that's not a star, that's a ufo." and immediately after, it faded completely out, then reappeared but this time in the middle of the cloud below it. over the next fifteen to twenty minutes, we watched it blink in and out. it would get bright enough at it's peak to rule out it's being a star, and at it's dimmest point it would vanish completely. after about twenty minutes, my girlfriend's brother, who we'd called out to come look, noticed a second light blinking red and white going toward it. when they got close to each other they both disappeared. they were gone for about ten minutes before, while i was writing this, the first light reappeared further to the west. right now i have to walk off of my back porch and look around a tree to see it, it's at roughly the same elevation and is still blinking.
content.summary: Very bright light that faded in and out for almost twenty minutes until a second light approached, then they both disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down forrester road heading toward westmorland, when all of a sudden a helicopter with red blinking lights caught my attention. as i focused in on the helicopter i noticed another object, which was right in front of the helicopter. i shouted to my significant other and her mother, "look at that" they quickly took notice. at first i thought the ufo was a highway patrol plane but once it approached i quickly knew it was out of this world. as for the helicopter that was not dought a helicopter because i was able to see the propellers, the entry door, and lights. as for the ufo it was cigar shaped with three bluish orb lights underneath the object, it had no windows and no wings. the object and the helicopter were close to the road that i could see the windows to the helicopter and am sure there was nothing on the other object. it seemed as if the ufo was traveling around 60 to 70mph which is an estimated speed. the speed i was traveling at was 60mph and this took around l minute, but was enough time to detail the sighting until we lost track of helicopter and the object, but it was headed toward mexicali or san diego. we lost track by continuing our trip home. as this happened we stayed completely stunned, and did not know what to say, we were speachless. i was in shock and felt as if it were a dream. this is 100% true people, i know what i saw and nobody can tell me different, we are not alone.
content.summary: Ufo was cigar shaped, with three orb lights and was being followed by helicopter on forrester road near brawley.

content.detailedDescription:
Watching the disneyland fireworks from the hill that i live on, the sighting lasted for almost one hour, the camera i used was of poor quality and did not capture the size or the many different changes in lighting and shape that the ufo transformed into during the sighting period.
i have no idea what the object was, although the indigo color's were like nothing that i have ever seen before in the sky from any kind of flying machine, in addition to this color it was at times red, green, white. with lights that actually seperated and then came back together, it appeared to be over the 91 fry and 57 exchange up about 300 feet off the ground, it moved from left to right slightly but stayed in the same location for the hour that we observed it.
content.summary: Multi color lights saucer shaped changing shape and color for approx. one hour

content.detailedDescription: I at first saw a helicopter, and red and blue lights separated by 2-3 hundred yards. i thought they were normal signal lights of the heli, then noticed they were way too far apart to be a part of the same aircraft. the blue light, which looked more like an orb with an internal light source, was about a third the size of the heli, and about 300 yards in front and above the heli. all of the sudden, the blue orb light accelerated way faster than the heli, evened out to the same altitude, then stoped and waited for the heli to catch up. once it did catch up, the blue orb made more manuvers "avoiding" or more like playing or teasing the heli. after focusing on the heli trying to keep up with the orb for about 2 minutes, i noticed a large flat grey colored craft in front of the blue orb, about the same distance away from the orb that the orb was from the heli (300 yrds). the large craft had no lights, which is why i didn't notice it until later in the experience. the large craft was being followed by the blue orb, was silent, classic ufo shape(but not shiny, flat grey in color), and kept a slow steady pace at around 60 mph. it seemed as though the blue orb was accompanying the larger ufo craft, and protecting it, or trying to divert the heli away from the craft. the orb was an aqua blueish color, somewhat "seethrough", had a small trail that followed behind it, and was capable of moving in all directions and stopping in mid air. the ufo craft however kept a straight heading, and had no lights in, on, or around it, besides the heli lights and the blue orb of course. i am certain these were not the traditional blinking lights all aircraft have. they moved independently, went in different directions, and held different speeds. the heli only had one red light, one, not two. it was one red light on the heli, the weird aqua blue orb, and a ufo all moving in the same general direction with the orb being the only object to deviate from a straight heading. i watch the skies every night because i have seen things 2 other times in my lifetime which started my interest. i was outside having a ciggarette and happened to witness this little "game" play out between the heli and the orb. the event lasted about 5 minutes, and i didn't about 6 double takes to make sure i wasn't imagining something that wasn't really happening. i am sure this was not normal craft. it looked like a chase by us after "them", with them laughing at our inability to keep up with them, and them having to alter their operations in order for us to keep up. strange to say the least. and i am of sound mind and have a master's degree. what i saw was definitely not ordinary. i did not have a camera of any kind at the time of the sighting unfortunately...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Helicopter chasing blue orb that could outmanuever the heli and a ufo. 3 objects total, 2 unidentified

content.detailedDescription: Paul hicks field investigator mufon. this is a report i obtained from my brother. i talked to him about the sighting and did an interview. mufon report was sent to ray boeche, nebraska state director, 2/27/1989. i received additional information from jay 4/1/1989 and 1/28/1990. and recently 8/10/2009. anyone wishing to contact jay may do so via his email address. jay lived on a ranch near south bend, ne. he had horses in the pasture, and dogs and cats. on this night his wife and 6 or 7 kids were in the trailer also. they apparently didn't wake up. he didn't know the date at first. weekend or he was on vacation. jay was a truck driver. between 12 and 2 am he was awakened by a loud roar and whistling sound accompanied by very bright flashing or rotating light. he said it was so loud he couldn't have heard the dogs bark. the light was blended yellow-gold mixed with red. they appeared to be coming down. the sound had quieted to a buzz or hum like an electric generator. he was in the bedroom in the west end of the trailer. object was to the north 100' or less away. he believes it came down in the horse arena either landed or hovering. he believes it sat down. there was a window on the west wall. there were lights reflecting off the tin barn and cars. he couldn't see the arena. out of the bedroom and to the left was the north door. he thought to go and look and the object took off, "like it read my mind". he feels it knew he was aware of it. almost gone instantly. 3 or 4 seconds. he said the event lasted 4 or 5 seconds, probably longer. he never actually saw an object. he said his dreams were illogical, this was real. he looked in the arena the next day and nothing. there was dry dust in the arena, deep. he had just disked it.  (he is very confused about some of the events either because it was years ago or something else. he said he can't remember clearly what happened. at various times he has told me different happenings. 1. after he thought to go to the door and it took off, he doesn't remember anything. thinks he went back to sleep. 2. i woke up and went back to sleep. don't know why i didn't go to the back door or living room window. 3. i went to the door and nothing. 4. he said he may have went to the door and went out. 5. i got up and thought i was dreaming and went back to bed. i got up again and it was still happening. more to come...
content.summary: Woke up between 12 and 2 am. loud roar, colored lights coming down outside. thought to go and look and it shot back up.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to run a meeting at st. vincents hospital on west 12 street ave of americas. something told me to look up, and i saw what appeared to be jet racing across the sky, but directly above the jet something caught my eye. it was round, (not good in directions) headed south (?)and flying  right over the jet which was headed west , it was moving very slow. as i was approaching the entrance of the hospital i kept looking up unitl it went over the hospital which then it blocked my view. but something interesting happended. as i stood there, i was just looking up to see if i could still see it, it returned and i got spooked because at this time it just hovered in the sky and stood there for a minute or so,(as if directly right above me -almost) i just kept looking at it, there were other people there but no one bothered to look up. as i kept looking at it, it began to once again, begin the same course it was taking earlier and went 'south' bound and was gone. it was round, whitish metallic in color, slow moving but manuvered back and forth....This has not been my only sighting. i have kept silent for years  its about my 4-5 fifth sighting in the last 20 years with one "possibel" abudcution experience when i was in college....And one contact via telepathy from a being who asked me to write 11 points of wisdom. i wrote them down and have shared it with very few people....Whats going on?
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo flying over a jet

content.detailedDescription: I was trvelling n. on i95 along side the phila. intrn. airport when i noticed the goodyear bimp off in the distance to my left probably just over the phila. sports stadium.However,there were also 4 huge parallelograms just floating languid around the blimp.Intrigued,as i approached the i95 bridge,i studied the objects.Traffic wes slowed over the bridge due to the ballgame to about 5-7mph.Suddenly, one ofthe  parallelograms on the right changed from a darker color to a brilliant white. the parallelograms were all so large that they would completely block out the blimp when one of them passed between the blimp and my line of sight.Finally the parallelograms moved in a northerly direction and disappeared over the horizon in about 5-6 minutes-a distance of 5-6 miles away.Also,one of these objects had 8-10 horizontal stripes,alternately one on top of the other in first a rusty red,then dirty green,then rusty red then dirty green pattern.There were no airplanes in the immediate vicinity.Remarkably,as i looked at the other drivers,no one seemed to be paying any mind to this odd scene,just myself.If you have any other reports of this incident or an explanation thereof,i'd appreciate the insight.My reactions were to the sighting were mild awe with a desire to see if these objects were ufos or whether i could determine that they were identifiable.My conclusion is that at least i could not identify the objects and that they were ufos.
content.summary: 3-4 large parallelograms

content.detailedDescription:
This is a typical nightly sighting in my area. since october of 2008, when i first noticed and reported what i saw then, every night the weather permits and there is no cloud coverage, i never fail to see the following: 

1. type of craft that is high in altitude, stationed far above the regulation of us air traffic in the same geographical areas without fail nightly. this one is the type that has the colored lights and produces small yellowish orbs that shoot out from it and return. this orb activity is generally in close range to the large bright craft that usually just stays at its station, however the orbs are capable of moving about and i have seen them go long distances form the large stationed ship. the only time i saw this type up close was with a spotting scope (magnification of 60x), which was not powerful enough to really see any more detail than with my normal vision. the main craft does change in light intensity at times. the colored lights seem to rotate from left to right or in a counter clockwise direction. when the orbs shoot out they seem to be fast and flash just long enough to determine their directional pattern, either to or from the large craft. as the earth rotates, the position in the sky usually causes them to drop out of view because this craft is stationed permanently. and not only this one, but there are several of these type and each has its own station. 

2. type of craft that appears as a bright white star. it is intensely white and spherical. these are capable of maneuvers in erratic patterns and tend to be still for a while, and suddenly move several degrees in a split second. the motions of this type of craft are erratic! i have seen them go from left to right so fast it looks like a white line. i also noticed these craft making circular swirls, zigzag, star, and wavelike patterns of flight. there are no flashing colored lights on the white star type but like the first type i mentioned, they do have orb activity associated with them. the orbs are the same yellowish color and seem to behave as with the colored type of craft. 

3. type of craft that is red and dimly lit up. no flashing lights. they are capable of speeds in excess of the speed of sound by several times. on occasion is seen moving across the sky at night and can go from one side of the horizon to the other in eight to ten seconds. i have never seen a red craft change course, always fly in a straight line pattern. 

4. type of craft that is dark with a light grey round dome in the center on its underbelly. like the red, this craft has no fleshing lights at all but this type does not glow. it is very stealth and dark. it���s very hard to see. i have only seen this type once. it was motionless, and suddenly went out of sight from a stationed position. 

with all the above mentioned craft, no sound is ever associated with any of these. i study these every night the weather permits and do have feelings that are not important. what seems important is this. i see them every night...And generally only hear of when others report a random sighting. not willing to speculate, but if one were to guess, our government knows and is not telling. the biggest question on my mind: are we being introduced to what others have known slowly on purpose? or, another secondary question that goes with that. do these craft, and any possible intelligence or beings associated with them, simply no longer care if they are being witnessed?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Witnessed two types of craft. star like and revolving colored lights with other smaller orbs.

content.detailedDescription: hello, i witnessed an event from my front porch .Did not report it till nw,and wanted to know if you had any records of this event?The fireballs angle was pretty low and it finally passed behind my neighbors house,leaving me to beleiveit was only seconds from crashing into ground. it was really big and trailed a pretty long tail.It lasted only about 10 seconds,that is why i think it hit earth just seconds after it passed behind my neighbors house. do you have any records of this event?I say the year was around 1990 but it could be 3 to 5 years off.Thank you very much for yooy reply--roger in s.C.Ps- i was 42 in 1990  ,so i am no kid.--thanks  i was sitting on my front porch--
content.summary: Flaming ball of fire was seen coming from the north and falling toward the south.

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of october 13th, 2009 near the city of redding, ca at approximately 9:40pm my wife and i were corralling our horses who had been spooked by a major storm when i had noticed a very strange object in a small clear patch of sky. what immediately drew my attention was the obvious circular shape of the object. the object seemed to be tilted at a slight angle allowing us to clearly see that the reddish/orange lights formed a perfect circle. i estimate that the object was approximately 1& 1/2 miles to the east and at an elevation of about 3,000ft. the object seemed to be relatively close to the proximity of our local airport. the object was also above the elevation that planes descending into the airport would normally be. i have seen hundreds of planes land at the airport because the flight path is very close to our house. this object was clearly not on a normal flight path. another fact that should be noted is that the wind gusts that night were around 50mph and there was absolutely no helicopters flying out of the local airport. the object was clearly not moving and was holding perfectly still in extremely strong winds. another obvious detail was that it was very bright and the object was still visible as the thin clouds would pass over it. the oddity of this object was so intense that my wife and i just stood there staring at it even though we had a minor emergency on our hands. the storm had knocked over part of my fence and one of my horses had ran down the road towards our neighbors. my wife and i had just returned with him and were getting him back in the field. when we saw the object we stood there saying "what is that? what is that?"  we watched the object for roughly 5 minutes before the clouds became to dense to see it anymore. my wife and i tried to explain it away but we just couldn't seem to come up with a logical answer for what it was we saw. my wife is a bit more skeptical than i am and she was troubled by what she saw. 

this story was made even stranger two days later on october 15th. my wife was reading the local rants and raves section of craigslist when she yelled for me to come over. someone had posted that at around 10:00pm on the night of october 14th (almost exactly 24 hours after our sighting) that the local police department had been flooded with calls about unidentified lights over the keswick dam area. which is only about 3 miles north of where we had our sighting. the post goes on to say that witnesses reported a bright flash like something had crashed in the mountains west of here towards eureka, ca. i have tried researching the local news reports and police station blogs but i have yet been able to verify the sightings. stories like this don't appear on rants and raves very often and i thought it was too coincidental that these alleged sightings had occurred within 24 hours of my wife and i seeing something we couldn't explain.
content.summary: During a major storm my wife and i were trying to coral our spooked horsed when we noticed a very bright circle of redish/yellow lights that appeared in a small patch of clear sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside smoking as i do every night, sky watching. i live 2 miles from stewart airpiort in newburgh, n. y..I am a disabled airforce veteran and use a powerwheelchair. i've seen many aircraft,and also worked on the flightline. was watghing flashing white, and red.The blinking pattern started to change as it flew west to east. low cloud coverage, broken up to very clear sky obove clouds. what i thiought was a aircraft went overhead about 2oooft, the lights i was wathching flash and thought were the approximate size of it, turned out to be a group of 3-4 light and as i could see better [overhead] they were attached to something in front of it wich was a huge white cloud colored, semi-transparent craft shape of a plane with a fuselodge twice as ling as a 767. the light's i was seeng were on the very top tip of tail, no faa wingtip strobes not another light on this whole massive craft, as it went overhead i heard a very strong elecrical hummmm, like the power lines give off. the humm lasted until it got about 2-3 miles to east, away. couldnt here the woode around me,everything else was like blocked out. ive seen crafrt before here in pine` bush, n.Y. and hudsonvalley  this is one that creeped me out because i heard or maybe even felt that humm!!I actually felt uncomfortable outside and when in, lol, yeah scary .Called my brother to tell him and in the middle i had to hang up told em i call back bloodpressure was up short breathe. i  lost sight of it as it continued east.
content.summary: Sitting outside my home was watching red,white flashing. as it got closer was listening for engine nosem nothinh. it went directly overhaed about 2000ft up. the object , " plane"made a very strong humming as it went by.

content.detailedDescription: I live on lake belton, across from fort hood testing (firing) range, (they own that half of lake, we sometimes feel like we live in one of those countries being bombed sometimes).  i was watching the aproaching storm, we have a kind of tree top home, all windows, we can see forever because of the height of our home, and we love to watch the storms coming from counties away.   i was on the phone with my mother in law in nj, when all of a sudden i saw 4 of the ufo's before the approaching storm, i started screaming at her that i was seeing them, and how they were appearing and disappearing.  then i realized no one would believe me without pictures, and i found my camera, they were appearing, in a "w" pattern, then 2 would dissapear, then reapear, i have 2 pictures of 2 of them, the other 2 disappeared, one is showing them as crafts with a white light across the whole bottom - then the next picture was amazing to me when i put them on my computer and zoomed in - they look like they were turning- but they appear as 2 little baby lightning bolts, then they disappeared as the storm got here,  my husband was driving up kykendall mountain road, at the time on his way home from work, and he saw them as well.  it was absolutely amazing!!!!  i have always believed, but i never thought i would see them, let alone get a picture of them!!!  the storm was one of the most amazing i had seen, i have those as well if you need them, with mammatos clouds, and then the sun was setting under the clouds and everything was amazing yellow.  i will never forget the feeling, that i knew we were not alone.   i watched the history channel last night, there was a series on the area 51, and you were mentioned, and i knew i had to send them to you, and i am happy to have found you.  thank you for taking the time to read this, and look at the pictures.
content.summary: They were flying in fron of approaching bad storm, i live on hill on lake

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying on my lawn chair as usual in my back yard looking for any unusual objects to film. i had the night scope/jvc camera next to me. from over the top of me from behind me came this huge oval orange object. i switched the camera on as fast as i could. by that time the object was by the trees in front of me. i was able to film some of it. it was so bright it easily shown through the trees! i jumped up from my lawn chair after a few second of taping it and  tried to get a lock on it again. i was able to film it some more as it passed from the trees then in front of the house. i would of run to the front but unfortunately earlier the battery went dead and i was plugged into the power cord, or i defiantly would have. i hope someone else in this area got it on tape. it was huge, about the size of the half moon but was oval shaped. it appeared to be a dark orange in the middle(kind of a burnt orange, i don't think i have really seen that exact hue before) and lighter orange on the outer. it also seemed to be one craft but kind of raggedy around the edges. this i am sure would of looked great with a color camcorder. the 40 second film i shot, the object is green because it was shot with a gen 2+ atn night scope attached to a jvc mini-dv camcorder and because of the very bright nature of it looked completely round. i feel super lucky to even get any of it!
i was facing east the object flew silently over me going west. time was approximately 21:56 hrs. i also posted this to youtube channel ufonv.
thank you,
jim
content.summary: Large burnt orange oval shapped object at least half size of full moon.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down rt3 onto rt2 heading south to marlbourgh this evening. i noticed a very large patchy illuminous object 30 degrees up from the horizon due east. looked very much like a comet tail. it would change its appearance and luminosity a bit wasn't sure if it was a sliver of the moon behind a cloud. also wondered if it was another atmospheric nasa rocket. although there were some high stratus clouds and stars were bright this object appeared to be farther away than the few alto stratus clouds. it just seemed odd and out of place. pulled off exit 10 on rt 2 and watched it for a while maybe 4 minutes before it slowly subsided and vanished. skys were relatively clear, could see bernice's hair easily in the lit parking lot.
content.summary: Comet like object due east then disapeared

content.detailedDescription: This was odd and stayed with me. i was driving on two-lane highway alt.40w going east through the maryland mountains just across the washington county line in frederick county, maryland. these are low mountains or high hills, around 300-500 feet. this incident occurred between 7:30pm and 8:00pm; the western sky to the right and behind me was still dimly lit along the horizon, and the eastern sky ahead of me and to the left was black. there was no moon that night. as i drove around a big curve in the road, i saw a light in my upper left peripheral vision, turned my head and looked there, and observed a large bright bluish white light quickly descending from the cloudless, black (new-moon) sky. it wasn't a flash, it was more like a huge searchlight from above in a wide short beam; however, nothing was visible above it, i.E., it wasn't attached to anything. i quickly opened the car window to listen but there was no sound. the light was maybe 30 feet above the tops of the highest trees on the mountain ridge. the span of the light was wider than a helicopter search light. it shot down and remained there for a short count, then disappeared from left to right. it lasted about 5-15 seconds--my guess is about seven seconds. i was driving at approximately 25mph at the time and almost drove off the road i was so astonished. there was a line of cars behind me because i was driving so slowly as i stared up and to my left; i recall wondering at the time if any of the drivers behind me saw it. none of them honked. the light was unnatural-looking in color, size and motion and it was very dense, not diffuse; however, the quick flash of a lightning bolt is comparable in intensity--but this was not, as i mentioned, a quick flash nor was it a slow blink. its color was similar to diode lights, a.K.A. extremely bright bluish white. no trees, no mountains obscured my view. i continued driving and, about 5-10 seconds later, i rounded the mountain and saw the valley immediately to my left. i could see the stationary low lights of the homes scattered around this farmland area of frederick county. there were no helicopters (my first thought) behind above nor around, no aircraft, nothing, just silence.
content.summary: Very bright, white-blue light descended from a clear sky; no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I believe that the right mind can sift thru all the evidence and find the truth. some of the data must be real instead of resulting from a hoax or a misinterpretation.

i am a retired aerospace engineer, grauated from caltech.

sincerely, harvey fiala
content.summary: Will there be more ufo programs on tv? ___ i miss them.

content.detailedDescription:
On june 10th 1978 at about 4pm, my mother and i were sitting on the covered porch of our farmington hills mi home when we heard a light buzzing or humming sound above us. i was curiuos and stepped out onto the sidewalk that leads to our driveway. when i looked up into the direction we thought the sound was coming from, i saw a circular object about 1200 feet directly above and slightly to the left of my position. i estimate the object to be about 75 to 100 feet accross and light grey in color. even though it was the middle of the day, i could clearly see white lights pulsing around the perimeter of the object in a clockwise direction. each pulse last about one second and i viewed these pulses for about 10 seconds before my mother joined me on the sidewalk. we watched it together for about 20 seconds and immediately identified it as a ufo because it hovered for about 30-40 seconds in one spot. my mother then went into the house the get her camera. as she came back out from the house (camera in hand) the ufo proceeded north at about 75-100 miles per hour for about 5 seconds before it made an abrupt 90 degree turn to the left at a very high rate of speed of what i estimate to be about 500-700 miles per hour. i would imagine that no human would be able to survive a g-force like that. from a straight flight line at about 100 miles per hour to an abrupt left turn at at least 500 miles per hour and stayed at that same speed from the exact point in the turn until it was out of our view. my mother never did get a picture as she could not get the lense cap off and get the camera focused in time. 
     we were both in awe of what we had seen. i was excited as i now had proof that we are not alone. it apraked my interest in all unknown things such as ufo's, the bermuda triangle and other similar things such as uso's.
     over the years following i have read many accounts of ufo & uso sightings and abductions. i also have more information that is of a personal nature that would be of great interest to anyone that has researched these kind of sightings.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Circular object hovered then moved about 1/2 mile to north before accelerating at high speed in opposite direction.

content.detailedDescription:
We went out to the okie pinoki to go check out the rumors of the ghosts that suppose to haunt the area. after wandering around the area for about 2 hours with our friends. my boyfriend and i decided to take off by ourselves for a little "alone" time. as we sat in our car talking and discussing our plans for the coming year, we noticed a car pull onto the road with some people in it. i waved at them as they drove off into the woods. as we sat there in the dark for another 10 minutes talking and listening to the radio, we noticed what looked like lightning in the distance. 

all of a sudden, the radio started to jump around and not stay on one radio station. as we looked at the radio, the entire area around us became as bright as daylight, we could see the trees and the grass around us. we looked up to see a large object above us, we also jumped out of the car, both out of curiosity as well as scared completely out or wits.

the next thing i remember we were standing outside of our car as we watched a large black triangular craft slowly move away from us. the craft slowly angled upwards and out of view in the clouds.

as we got into the car, we thought that only a few seconds had passed, much to our horror three hours has passed!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

i did not want to report this incident, but this sighting has really affected my life. i am scared to sleep in complete dark, i feel that someone is watching me now. my boyfriend has completely freaked out and sleeps with his lights on now, he is scared and so am i.
content.summary: Large black triangle with three bright lights one bright red light in center

content.detailedDescription:
The place i work is under the landing path of o'hara airport
the planes land and take off over our building
they are very low when landing
i have worked at this location for over 15 years
i know the sound of airplanes/airport very well

i herd a strange sound in the sky that i have herd before thru the years one of the other people also herd the sound last year with me

i was leaving work
i was facing south so to my left was east [ o'hara ]
to my right was west
i herd a strange woosh/swoosh sound with a dopler shift
moving from east to west super fast in the sky ,but kind of low
and loud enough to make you stop moving and look up
i look up and see nothing
the wind was very gentle, leaves hardley moving
their was no sound before or after the event

i have never herd this type of sound anywere before
content.summary: Woosh sound very fast

content.detailedDescription: This happened at my parents house two miles south of taylor and i believe it was 1976.We still did not have power yet.I had a friend over andy s. and i was getting tired of all the [cms/tg/pd] that goes on when you have friends over nite.I was looking up through the sliding glass door when i saw a bluish white light moving from spot to spot in the night sky.It appeared to me that it was going from star to star.I told my friend and he laughed at me and told me they were galaxies and there is no way a ship is going to be that big.He came to the window and by then it had stopped and he said "oh sure i see it !" and went back and laid down.I kept watching with my brother and it started up again and i yelled at him to get up and look again.It stopped again and he laid down again.Some time had passed i guess a half hour and i was determined to prove that i was seeing something by now my brother was layong down too.It started up again and now started to descend (really it was like it dropped) as it approached it seemed to be blinking a soft red glow and appeared to be about twenty feet in diameter and was blinking on for about four seconds and then off for about the same( it seemed to keep a very dim red glow from within at all times as it moved ).It came to stop about a quater a mile away and about one hundred and fifty feet off the ground.We were all screaming  at my mother who was sleeping in the back bedroom to get up and come look but she was very tired and was yelling at us to go to sleep cause it was a quarter to midnight.It moved west toward ralph h.Sr. ranch at about ten to twelve miles per hour.It put out a single spot light  as it passed over lovelake rd.And then another and another till there was five light one in the middle and four around the center it started spot lighting the corn fields in a wild manner it reminded me of van halen when i saw them twice on the 1984 tour.The light all spot lighted a single place in front of the ship and the ship was now dark and it came to a stop when all the lights were directly under it.The four lights blinked off and the center light seemed to brightened for a second before it to blinked off.We waited for probably a minute before the red glow returned and now the red blinking quickened as the ship sped off and arching back up into the sky and disappeared, it took on a steady bluish white glow as it had before it's descent.My mother would have been a good witness but she arrived in the living room to late.
content.summary: First ufo sighting at my parents house.

content.detailedDescription: Looked out of window saw a white flash, then i saw it again flash, move behind trees flash again and was gone. i checked several more times. i saw another object move toward me, yellow and small, and it dissappeared.
content.summary: Looked out window saw a white flash, watched and saw it move and flash two more times.

content.detailedDescription: I go to a.Maceo smith high school in oak cliff in 3030 stag road it was wensday after school 3:45 that's the time school get's out right when the bell ring i went stright into the bus doing at that time i've been reading lot's of books about ufos the subject about aliens ufos and unexplained phenomena was always on my mind at the time i could not stop thinking about so i researched it all early that week and so after school as i rode the bus not talking to any of my friends reading mysteries,legends and unexplained phenomena by linda s.Godfrey and consulting editor :rosemary ellen guiley as i was rideing the bus around 3:52 i saw a large 30 foot long cigar shape object standing still over a contrion yard near my house no one sees but me as the bus makes a left turn the object starts to move it makes a 30 degree turn and then it starts to follow the bus by 30 feet beside the bus and 10 foot up passeing over houses keeping up with the bus i was seting on the right side of the bus as i was obseving it i turned to my left to see if anyone else is seeing what i'im seeing most of the other kids were sleep and some listening to music a sleep and i turn around to see if one of my friends seting behind me is looking too he was awake looking forward at the bus he rolls his eye at me with no expession at all and contunes to look foward i turn back my attention to the object still move with the bus until the bus makes a another left turn the object then disappers into the woods over large trees i then look in amazement at my friend behind me and say did you see that he replies saying what!? i just said nevermind as i got off the bus i looked at the clock on the bus it was 4:08 then without saying anything to my friend who got off too i went stright home as i can see forward  my mom"s home i checked the mailbox then looked into the sky when a disc shape object which i did not see coming glided 5 feet over my head then i blacked out wakeing up seeing me with the mail in my hand i then walked into the porch fast and hit the door bill my dad opened the door and chris where have you been over a friend's house i then what are doing here dad he then said what you talking about chris i just came from work i turned around fast to see my dad"s truck behind me and then i ran and looked at the time in the kitchen then i ran and looked at the clock on the tv in the living room my mom was watching looking like what"s going on i explained to them what i've experineced my father seemed like he belived me my mom was skptical that night i was sleeping until awoken up to two reptilion like creatures that stood up right in my room they were about 8-9 feet tall bipdal with large tails behind them i looked at my clock it was 2:02 i then to my dog socks whom was still a sleep not moveing at all i was not a afriad at all then blacked out having vived dreams about being on a ship seting on a large table there was more reptilion like creatures one in purticlar told me not to be afriad mently in my mind then started to tell me about who i was secetly and that i was the important human to them and told me my future on what"s who i become they told me that i would become they then took me into a elvator like room next to me was a large window showing the aliens and spaceship on the ground i then could tell i was on another planet the sky "s were orange like it looked more like mars then i turned around and the door to the elvator door opened a bright light flash and then awoken up in my bed thinking to my self that was weird i then got ready for school that"s my first enconter of aliens i"ve always belived in ufos i"ve always had a open mind about  things i think its pretty cool that i"ve come a cross this.
content.summary: Short disc

content.detailedDescription: Please contact soon. i will be changing my number.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Intersection in the sky. no third parties are to contact me.

content.detailedDescription: This was in or around 1995 when me and my girlfriend stopped at a park by a school in crete il to sit and talk as soon as we arrived we looked at the time and it was eight thirty she had to be home at nine pm so we had a half hour. we walked a very short distance and she sat down right away and suddenly before i even sat down she was wide eyed i turned my head to see what it was and i first noticed three airplane lights attached to a craft that was the size of a sky scraper turned on its side the middle was wider than the ends and its color must of been black because it was alot darker than the clear night sky.Be fore she could finish asking me if i saw it i replied yes. it was jaw dropping but my curiosity was greater than my fear. the perrimiter of the park was surrounded by peoples back yards. i immediately began to yell for anyone with a camera or if they were out could they see this in the sky. as it began to drift i ran through the field it was a very short run. i wanted to see more it was drifting out of my sight so i ran through one persons back yard and suddenly i was just standing in a strange spot and heard my girlfriend calling my name jason where are you. i walked out of the yard to her and back into the field. she said she was looking for me forever i have to go home but i argued i only went into that yard and came right back. when we got into the car it was 9 pm and i asked her how that was possible and again she said she was looking for me for a long time. well we arrived at 8 30 pm it wasn't more than five minutes we saw the craft or more than a minute after that i ended up in the yard. the field is very short you could walk across it in two minutes and all this happened so quickly. there is no explanation for where i was or where the time went. a week later my friend introduces me to a book hes reading called communion after i tell him my story. he explains the connection between lost time and abduction? its the only reasonable explanation. since then i have only had many realistic dreams of ufo sightings.
content.summary: Rectangle shaped craft blacker than night like a sky scraper turned on its side with little airplanr lights
